text: Jab wahāṅ ke mardoṅ ne Ribqā ke bāre meṅ pūchhā to Is'hāq ne kahā, “Yih merī bahan hai.” Wuh unheṅ yih batāne se ḍartā thā ki yih merī bīwī hai, kyoṅki us ne sochā, “Ribqā nihāyat ḳhūbsūrat hai. Agar unheṅ mālūm ho jāe ki Ribqā merī bīwī hai to wuh use hāsil karne kī ḳhātir mujhe qatl kar deṅge.”
